events.title: R&B PREPARTY
events.description:
To kick off the Spring Break Battle weekend, we're hosting an all-R&B affair! From battles to cyphers, it's going to be an absolute vibe.

This 2vs2 open styles competition features an impressive panel of judges and a cash prize for the winners. Be sure to come on time to catch all the action!

Judges: MT Pop, Zenta, Complex
DJ: MagicSean
MC: Auggie

Entry: $25 to battle (spectators free)
Prize: $400

Note: This is a 21+ event

events.title: SPRING BREAK BATTLE: 3VS3 OPEN STYLES
events.description:
The 3vs3 Open Styles bracket is back for its fourth consecutive year! Get excited and start forming those teams for this highly anticipated competition.

Featuring world-class judges, professional DJs, and even a special guest battle team. This is the main event of the Spring Break Battle weekend that you won't want to miss.

Judges: Storm, Hurrikane, Waackxxxy
DJs: MagicSean & Tinman
MC: Jake Finesse
Guest Battle Team: MT Pop, Zenta, Complex

Entry: $30
Prize: $1,200

events.title: SPRING BREAKIN BATTLE
events.description:
Spring Break Battle presents Spring Breakin Battle! This exciting crew vs crew breaking competition brings together teams of 3-7 members to battle for glory and a substantial cash prize.

Featuring legendary judges from the breaking scene and professional DJ and MC to keep the energy high throughout the event.

Judges: Storm, Poe One, Complex
DJ: FooJin
MC: Jake Finesse

Entry: $25 per person (includes spectators and battlers)
Prize: $1,500

events.title: BREAK FLUID JAM: VANCOUVER EDITION
events.description:
Yaks & Jaylo present Break Fluid Jam Vancouver Edition! This major breaking event features multiple battle categories with impressive prize pools.

The event includes:
- 2vs2 battle for $2,000 CAD
- 1vs1 bgirl battle for $650 CAD and a trip to @fssworldwide (4 invites, 4 open slots)
- 7 to Smoke kids battle for $500 CAD
- Exhibition battle: @machphive vs @straycurt

Hosted by: @thedamnnerdking & @switchbfam

DJs: @yakss.85, @djfleg, @dj.jaylo

Judges vary by category and include @philsvir, @bounce_s.r, @elijahsxc, @jazze2fresh, @machphive, and @straycurt

A Friday night rocking workshop by @kitchyrock will be presented by @outlawrock_danceforum

events.title: BREAK TO @ STC 2025
events.description:
TorontoBreakDance.com & STC present Break TO @ STC 2025, featuring a 2vs2 Breaking Battle with Canadian Olympic Gold Medallist Phil Wizard as special guest judge.

$3,400 Total Cash Prizes (Payout to Top 8):
- $2,000 1st Place
- $500 2nd Place
- $200 Top 4
- $100 Top 8

Judges:
- Phil Wizard (Red Bull All Stars / United Rivals)
- Illz (United Rivals / GI)
- Tafiya (Floor Gangz / Kybalion)

DJ: Yaks (Concrete Allstars)
MC: Switch B (FAM)

Prelims @ 1pm Sharp!

Free Event - Teams will be capped due to time constraints so sign up quick to reserve your spot.

events.title: DRAFT WARS
events.description:
DRAFT WARS brings a unique Pro-Am Draft 4v4 battle format (2 Adults, 2 Youth), where youth must be 17 and under. This community-focused event aims to bring together dancers of all ages.

Featuring professional judges, DJs, and a $1,000 cash prize for the winners.

Judges: @bboybowzee, @puzzlesroc, @yakss.85
DJs: @flipout, @dj.jaylo
MC: @switchbfam

Sponsored by: @slowjamsundays, @goldenvalleyeggs, @diptvancity, @tabletutors

Tickets: $20 at the door

events.title: JUST 4 KICKS ALL VS ALL CREW BATTLE
events.description:
After 11 years, it's back! Floorstorm Crew Presents: Just 4 Kicks All VS All Crew battle!

This unique format has each crew battling each other once - no judges, no winners, no losers, just battling for rep!

DJs:
- @fnkybndt
- @trickytroublez
- @dj_ice_b

The 8 crews battling are:
- @hoodzcrew
- @binnez_as_usual
- @hooligunzz
- @nss_breakers
- @doomshotbreakerz
- @packofbanditz
- #FoolsCrew
- #BCBuds

Admission: $15

events.title: END OF TERM BATTLE - WINTER EDITION
events.description:
Closing out the term with BIG energy‚Äîbattles, workshops, and community vibes all packed into one weekend!

This multi-style battle features four categories:
- House (25 slots)
- Wh/Aacking (25 slots)
- Breaking (15 slots)
- NEW! Locking (15 slots)

Judges:
- House: @comrade_psilo
- Wh/Aacking: @simziez (Vancouver, BC)
- Breaking: @lunatic_unl
- Locking: @sbz_joshua (@lzb_locking)

Hosted by ORB & FREE
DJ: MAC TRAY

To be mindful of time, there will be a cap for signups, so arrive early to secure your spot for the prelims.

Entry: $7 online sign-ups | $5-15 sliding scale at the door

Plus: END OF TERM WORKSHOP WITH SIMRAN on Sunday, April 13th, 1-3 PM ($20 Members | $30 Non-Members)

events.title: MASSIVE MONKEES DAY 2025
events.description:
Get ready for Massive Monkees Day on Memorial Day weekend, May 24-26th with the main event on Sunday May 25th!

3VS3 CREW BREAKIN'
- 1st place: $6,000
- 2nd place: $1,500
- 3rd and 4th place: $300 each crew

This year features 3 invited crews, 1 pre-qualified crew (Heavy Loaf - Canada, Winners of NW qualifiers), and 4 spots up for grabs in the prelims.

2VS2 OPEN STYLES
- 1st place: $1,000
- 2nd place: $200
- Top 8 pre-qualified crew - @midnightsociety04 (Winners of NW qualifiers)

Plus: Footwork Master Championship for Custom 4 Finger ring

FULL WEEKEND SCHEDULE:
Day 1 - Saturday May 24th - Prelims (2-8pm, Location TBD)
Day 2 - Sunday May 25th - Main event (5-10pm, Neptune Theatre)
Day 3 - Monday May 26th - Massive Break Challenge (Time/Location TBD)
Day 3 - Monday May 26th - Massive community jam/BBQ (2-6pm, Jefferson Park)

Plus parties, workshops, and more to be announced!

events.title: RED BULL BC ONE CANADA CYPHER - CALGARY QUALIFIER
events.description:
The Red Bull BC ONE Canada Cypher circuit comes to Calgary! This qualifier event gives breakers the opportunity to secure a spot at the National Finals.

Top 4 Bboys & Top 2 Bgirls from this regional cypher will advance to the National Finals on April 26th in Montreal.

MCs: @the.rubix.universe, @sarahgoodmedicine
DJ: @foomanchoo
Judges: Igni, @bgirl_sashafox, @tko_yyc

This year, Red Bull BC ONE in Canada will incorporate no wildcards - all participant dancers must register to battle at a regional cypher for a place in the National Final.

Open to participants 16+ years old. Register to participate at redbull.ca/bcone

Spectator tickets: $15

events.title: FLOORGANGZ NORTH AMERICA ANNIVERSARY 2025
events.description:
Floor Gangz returns with their North America Anniversary 2025 event! This celebration brings together dancers for cyphers, battles, and good vibes.

The event features:
- 1v1 Footwork battles ($500 prize)
- 3v3 Breaking battles ($600 prize)
- Open cyphers

Judges:
- @bounce.sr
- @lx_flgz
- @kybaliontafiya
- @profo_flgz
- @keith3j

DJs:
- @djfleg
- @jus.one.oh
- @delroks
- @lx_flgz

Admission:
- $20 (Presale)
- $25 (Door)

Registration available on @breakkonnect

events.title: SMOKED IN OHIO 9: THE FINAL EDITION
events.description:
With a heavy heart, this will be the LAST Smoked in Ohio event after 9 successful editions. The organizers promise to make it the best one yet with a two-day celebration of breaking culture!

DAY 1 (April 18 @ The Kutt Records, 6pm):
- Top2Bottom format inspired by the @birthboyz from Portland
- Toprock/Footwork only jam - no power moves or freezes
- $200 prize

DAY 2 (April 19 @ The Forum, Doors at 12pm):
- 1v1 Kids Battle (15 and under)
  - $200 prize
  - Prelims @ 12:30pm
- 1v1 Breaking Battle
  - $2,000 prize
  - Prelims @ 3pm

Sponsored by Motor City Street Dance Academy (@motorcitysda)
Flyer artwork by @60_phade

More details about afterparties and Sunday activities to be announced.

events.title: STYLE IS KEY - 2 BATTLES
events.description:
Style is Key brings two exciting battle formats to Boombox Bar!

1. 2vs2 All Styles Battle
   - Prize: $200 + tickets to a Kraken game

2. 7 to Smoke
   - 8 selected boys from the PNW
   - Prize: $350

Doors open at 2pm
Battles begin at 3pm

Stay tuned for more information coming soon!

#headspin206 #headspinproductions #seattle #dance #community #battle

events.title: CYPHER QUEENZ PORTLAND BGIRL SESSION
events.description:
CYPHER Queenz Portland hosts a special Bgirl session creating space for women to learn, session, cypher and build community in the Hip Hop breaking scene.

This session includes:
- Workshop led by @leah_scotia
- Open cypher time
- All levels welcome!

Everyone's welcome to stick around for the @break_thyself session immediately following from 4-6 pm.

CYPHER Queenz sessions aim to elevate women in the breaking community while providing a supportive environment for learning and growth.

Flyer design: @Chris.kaku

events.title: THE BBOY BEATDOWN
events.organizer: Arsenal Wars & Tablist of the Tri / @prokidsofficial
events.description:
THE BBOY BEATDOWN brings together multiple elements of hip-hop culture for an epic day of battles and art.

The event features:
- 2v2 Bboy/Bgirl battle
- Skratcher Tri Cities
- Arsenal Wars (Graffiti - Art Display)
- 1v1 Funk n Poppin Battles
- Rap/Emcee Battles

This comprehensive celebration of hip-hop culture brings together dancers, artists, DJs, and MCs in the Tri-Cities area.

Sponsors include:
- Heart of the Tri Cities
- Thomas Chung Videography | Photography
- Skratcher

events.title: CYPHER TOWN HIP-HOP FESTIVAL: SILVERBACK EUROPE
events.description:
In the summer of 2025, Cypher Town takes over the streets of Budapest once again to celebrate the diversity and raw energy of hip-hop culture! This year makes history as Silverback comes to Europe for the first time ever!

This three-day festival features world-class breaking battles, workshops, and competitions across multiple styles with an impressive ‚Ç¨27,000 (~11,000,000 HUF) total prize pool.

Competition Categories:
Stage 1 - Breaking:
- B-Girl 1vs1
- B-Boy OPEN 1vs1
- Kids 1vs1
- Crew 3vs3

Stage 2 - All Style:
- Hip-Hop 1vs1
- House 1vs1
- All Style 2vs2

Event Schedule:
Day 1 (August 1) ‚Äì Workshop Day
üìç 1134 Budapest, D√≥zsa Gy√∂rgy √∫t 53

Day 2 (August 2) ‚Äì Pre-selection Battles
üìç 1062 Budapest, V√°ci √∫t 1-3 (Westend Shopping Center)
(Free for audience, registration fee for competitors)

Day 3 (August 3) ‚Äì Finals Day (12:00 PM - 10:00 PM)
üìç 1134 Budapest, D√≥zsa Gy√∂rgy √∫t 53

Special Note: Cypher Town happens just one week after Outbreak Europe (only 160 km from Budapest), and the celebration continues at Sziget Festival (August 6-11)! Perfect for an extended European hip-hop tour.

Free entry for children up to 4 years old.

events.title: ROCK ALL DAY ANNIVERSARY JAM
events.description:
Rock All Day Anniversary Jam celebrates 15 years of crew history! This special anniversary event brings together the entire RAD crew lineage for a day of battles, activities, and celebration.

The event features:
- Crew vs Crew Breaking Battles ($3,000 prize)
- 1vs1 Kids Breaking Battle ($350 prize)
- Food, giveaways, basketball, and more activities

Schedule:
- 1:00 PM: Competitor check-in and warm-up
- 2:00 PM: Prelims begin
- 4:00 PM: Doors open to general public
- Followed by Top 8 battles

Bring your friends and family to celebrate and rock out with the RAD crew!

events.title: ATX Breaking League - EVENT 2
events.description:
Support the future of Breaking! This event is part of the pathway to the Junior Olympic Games for youth breakers.

Host: Bboy Wicket
DJ: @djmontecarloatx
Judges: @zeshenhk, @bboyjustdre_sc, DaveRok

All ages welcome with FREE admission!

Doors open: 2:30 PM

Powered by:
- @silverbackbboyevents
- @youthbreakingchamps
- @aaubreaking

Also supported by:
- @danzversity
- @thebreakbook
- @resilientrecovery.htx

All events produced by @break.expectations (501c3 non-profit)

events.title: LIONZ OF ZION 29 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
events.description:
Lionz of Zion 29 Year Anniversary celebration featuring a 1vs1 Breaking battle with a crazy prize pool! This hip-hop celebration promises an evening of high-level competition and community vibes.

Prize Structure:
- 1st Place: $1500
- 2nd Place: $500
- 3rd Place: $250
- 4th Place: $150
- 5th Place: $150
- 6th Place: $150
- 7th Place: $150
- 8th Place: $150

Schedule:
- Cypher Prelims: 6:00PM-7:45PM
- Main Event: 4:00PM-10:00PM

Judges: Flowers, Toxsick, Nemesis
Hosts: Goof & Trus
DJ: Fleg

NYC Qualifier was held on March 15th at Rep Cafe with 2 Top 16 slots available.

Flyer design by @iamprevail

events.title: DUBAI OPEN BREAKIN'
events.description:
Mark your calendars for this major international breaking event in Dubai, UAE on December 19-20, 2025. This high-stakes competition features multiple battle categories with an impressive prize pool.

Competition Categories (16+ age requirement for all):
- 1vs1 B-Boys
- 1vs1 B-Girls
- 5vs5 Crew Battles

Event Features:
- 9 International Judges
- Total Prize Money Over $100,000

This two-day event promises to bring together top talent from around the world in one of the most prestigious breaking competitions of 2025.

Flyer design by @ziknikita
Music by @djleg1oner

events.title: THE RECKLE$$ FOOTWORK BATTLE
events.description:
In Memory of our brother Isaiah aka "Reck"...

The Reckle$$ Footwork Battle is a 1vs1 breaking competition highlighting the footwork category. Tops and drops will also be scored, as they should all flow together even when highlighting footwork.

Brotha Reck was true to the game, he kept it raw and reckle$$. This battle honors his name and legacy. This is an invite-only bracket featuring a Top 16 Bboy format.

Schedule:
- Event: 6:00pm-9:00pm
- Invited Top 16 Bboy bracket starts at 7:00pm

The event will include games, drinks, and open cyphers for everyone to enjoy.

Note: This is a 21+ event with valid ID required.

events.title: GET DOWN AT THE NIGHT MARKET: Tradition 2025 Summer Edition
events.description:
Tradition & Sunny Jack presents Get Down at the Night Market Dance Battle! This all-ages outdoor event combines dancing, food, and community vibes at the beautiful Bremerton Boardwalk Waterfront.

Event Features:
- 1vs1 Dance Battle with Cash Prize
- Free Entry for Spectators and Competitors
- Food/Beer Garden/Music
- All Ages Welcome

Music Styles:
- Break Beats
- Old School HipHop
- House
- Funk

Schedule:
- Sign Up: 4:00pm
- Prelims: 5:00pm
- Top 8: 6:30pm
- Top 4: 7:30pm
- Finals: 8:30pm

Host/MC: Jireh Soriano
DJ: DJ Digz
Judges: TBD

Come enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of the Bremerton Boardwalk Night Market while witnessing exciting dance battles!

events.title: CORK HIP HOP JAM
events.description:
Cork Hip Hop Jam brings together dance battles and graffiti on Sunday, April 20th for a complete celebration of hip hop culture in Cork City.

Competition Categories:
- 1v1 Breakdancing (‚Ç¨100 first place prize)
- 1v1 AllStyles - breaking excluded (‚Ç¨100 first place prize)

Schedule:
- Battles: 7pm - 10pm
- AfterParty: 10pm - close

Graffiti Jam locations:
- Patrick's Street (Debenhams building)
- Sullivans Quay (Across foot bridge from Grand Parade)

Admission: ‚Ç¨10 on the door

Note: This is strictly an over 18s event

Poster by @street_vocabulary

#TNWC #CorkHipHop #420 #HipHopJam #DanceBattles #Breakdance #AllStyle #HipHop #GraffitiJam #IrishGraffiti #Graffiti #CorkCity

events.title: NEW BIRTH 16 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
events.description:
New Birth Crew 16 Year Anniversary in Portland, Oregon.

Competition Categories:
- 2v2 Breakin' Battle (Prize: $1000)
- 1v1 Top2Bottom (Toprock + Footwork) (Prize: $500)

DJs:
- DJ Foojin
- DJ Edy Slic

Save the date and book your flights.

Flyer artwork by @nicegreg

events.title: ZONA CENTRAL RED DEER
events.description:
Zona Central brings multiple battle categories to Red Deer with competitions for all ages.

Competition Categories:
- Alpha Circuit Breaking 1vs1 Under 10 ($100 prize)
- Alpha Circuit Breaking 1vs1 Under 14 ($100 prize)
- Alpha Circuit Breaking 1vs1 14+ ($100 prize)
- Open Styles Youth 7 to Smoke (14 and under) ($100 prize)
- 3vs3 Open Styles ($300 prize)

Schedule:
- Doors Open: 4:30 PM

Entry:
- $15 for First Battle
- $10 for each additional category
- $15 for Spectators

DJs: DJ Catfish & Grimrock

Organized in partnership with The Breaks YYC, Pound It, and Alpha Circuit.

events.description:

events.description:
√áa va √™treüî• Montr√©al n'accueille pas seulement les Nationaux cette ann√©e, mais aussi le camp Red Bull ! Un week-end d'activit√©s, avec plein d'√©v√©nements gratuits.

events.title: LOOP THE BREAK VOL. 4
events.description:
Loop the Break vol. 4 is about to shake Helsinki! Three days of raw energy, top battles, and global vibes.

Event Schedule:

events.title: ROASTED
events.description:
ROASTED - In honor of Rusty "Roasty" Waldron

A free entry breaking battle with major cash prizes and special performances in Portland!

Competition Categories:

events.title: THE GETDOWN VOL. 4

location.address: 116 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362

events.description:
The Getdown returns for its fourth volume in downtown Walla Walla at Heritage Square Park. 

June 21st, 2025 - mark your calendars. More information will be announced soon.

events.title: RAPTURE VOLUME 7 FUNDRAISER: PRO-AM CONNECTION

location.address: Bonsor Recreation Complex, Burnaby, BC (by Metrotown Skytrain Station)

events.description:
Rapture - an expression or manifestation of ecstasy or passion!

Our annual fundraising breaking event features a unique Pro-Am format with professional and student breakers paired together. This year's format will be 2v2 (Pro & Student duos) with preliminary battles to determine the top spots. Once selected, pros and students will be randomly paired to battle together as duos.

Event Format:
Preliminary Rounds:
- Top 16 Pros selection (open level 17 & up)
- Top 8 students (12 & under) selection
- Top 8 students (13-16 years) selection

Main Event:
- Top 8 Pros randomized selection pairing with top 8 (13-16 year old students)
- Top 9-16 Pros randomized selection pairing with the top 8 (12 & under students)

Prizes:
- Two sets of winners
- 1st place out of the top 8 Pros & top 8 (13-16 students): $150 cash
- 1st place out of the top 9-16 Pros & top 8 (12 & under students): $150 cash

MC: @thepeoplestyrant (Sevi Sev on flyer)
DJ: @dj.jaylo
Judges: @mattscndrl (Infamous Matt), @eddwhat, @jimochiiwaruii

Admission Fee: $15 per person at the door

The goal is to bring everyone under one roof and inspire the next generation of breakers to help elevate the local breaking scene!

events.title: MBC CHAMPIONSHIP FINALE
events.description:
Breaking Boundaries presents the Massive Break Challenge Championship Finale! This free community event features high-energy breaking battles and showcases.

Doors open: 6:00 PM
Battles & Showcases: 6:15 ‚Äì 8:30 PM

Judges: Guest judges
DJ: TBA

events.title: KAPWASTRONG FUNDRAISER BATTLE
events.description:
On April 26th, 2025 the Filipino community in Vancouver, BC faced an abhorrent tragedy as many people lost their lives or injured from such a despicable act. Being neighbors and PNW family, we could not sit here and do nothing to help/show support to our Filipino and Vancouver brothers and sisters. This is our answer to lend a hand of comfort in a time of pain.

Please join us for the #KapwaStrong Fundraiser Battle for the Filipino Community of Vancouver.

All proceeds will be donated to Filipino BC, to find out more about this organization or to donate if you can‚Äôt make it to the event visit https://filipinobc.com

2 vs 2 Bboy Battle 
Date: June 7th, 2025
Doors Open: 5 pm
Admission (suggested donation): $20
Venue: Seattle Vineyard
4142 Brooklyn Ave NE
Seattle, WA 98105

DJ: Erv (Illaskan Assassins, Anchorage AK)

As a scene that has been influenced by many of our Filipino artists, it‚Äôs fitting to give back to them. Shoutout to the Seattle Vineyard Church for donating the space as well!

‚ÄúPag may hirap, may ginhawa‚Äù - when there is hardship, there is also relief.

#bboy #community #bcstrong #vancouver #seattle #dance #filipino #fundraiser #battle #pnw #lapulapu #unity #breakdance #donation
